description: Some of the easiest and most interesting trails on the Big Island of Hawaii are at the resorts. The Hilton resort at Waikoloa has beach trials and parts of the Kings trail which are all accessible to any one, you don't have to be staying at the resort.There is section with petroglyphs, several sections with ponds. The Mauna Lani resort has Fish ponds where you can see a variety of tropical fish.The beach trail goes from the Waikoloa resort to the Mauna Lani resort with loops are the ponds available.Some sections of the trail are lava and not easy walking.The other feature of these trails is you can plan to stop for food or tropical refreshments at one of the resort restaurants along sections of the trail
directions: From Highway 19 take the road to Waikoloa or Mauna Lani, there is parking available at both resorts. Waikoloa gets you closer to the beach.
title: Waikoloa Resorts Beach trails
